short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realtime Gold and Silver prices. Powered by Mavatec Corporation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Realtime Gold and Silver Prices. Prices are updated a few times per minute and displayed in the extension's pop up window, which appears when the extension's  icon is clicked. 

The user can choose to see the prices for two different weight units (USD/oz and USD/g).
